article_title: Father mourns three children after Rafah strikes.
sentence: Islam  Harb  is  getting  ready  to  bury  his  twin  daughters  and  son,  after  they  were  killed  in  an  air  strike  on  Rafah,  in  the  far  south  of  Gaza.

article_title: Father mourns three children after Rafah strikes.
sentence: Hamas  health  officials  in  Gaza  said  22  people,  including  children,  were  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  in  the  city  overnight.
